Text:
Thanks Nate. i have some suggestions for you to make your work much faster and remove duplicated files making also the torrent be much lighter while having even more content and more quality.I'm seeding this stuff you published with emule but if we coordinate our work together, it will be much better. I added you to my facebook page some months ago but you disabled your account ability to receive messages from people.
Hope to see you there and please allow me to send you messages so we can talk and help each other! God bless you for seeding the Gospel!
